title: fragment/rdf_streaming_updater/side_output_common
description: Common fields for side output events (flink rdf-streaming-updater)

$schema.description: A URI identifying the JSONSchema for this event. This should match an schema's $id in a schema repository. E.g. /schema/title/1.0.0

uri.description: Unique URI identifying the event or entity

request_id.description: Unique ID of the request that caused the event

dt.description: UTC event datetime, in ISO-8601 format

domain.description: Domain the event or entity pertains to

stream.description: Name of the stream/queue/dataset that this event belongs in

dt.description: (should be part of /fragment/common) time at which this event is produced (processing time of the flink pipeline)

original_ingestion_dt.description: time at which the event entered the flink pipeline, in ISO-8601 format

revision_id.description: revision for which this event was triggered for

original_event_info.title: fragment/common
original_event_info.description: Common schema fields for event schemas

$schema.description: A URI identifying the JSONSchema for this event. This should match an schema's $id in a schema repository. E.g. /schema/title/1.0.0

uri.description: Unique URI identifying the event or entity

request_id.description: Unique ID of the request that caused the event

dt.description: UTC event datetime, in ISO-8601 format

domain.description: Domain the event or entity pertains to

stream.description: Name of the stream/queue/dataset that this event belongs in

dt.description: (should be part of /fragment/common) original event time
